item.description:
It's the first annual Providence Collective Picnic and everyone is welcomed to attend. The following details below are simple and straightforward. If anyone has any additional questions, please don't hesitate to message me.

Please consult the following discussion thread to view side dishes being brought, and donations being accepted:

http://www.meetup.com/newintown-995/messages/boards/thread/25665392


Location Details:

  • Shelter 3 (click here: map)
  • Plenty of parking and open space
  • Bathroom north of shelter within 100 yards
  • There are 6 park benches available
  • Two charcoal grills available for cooking (I'll also bring a portable gas one too)


Park Details:

  • Dog friendly (as long as the dog is on a leash)
  • Park closes at sunset, so that the latest the picnic can go


Event Details:

I will supply the following...

  • Meat (Nathans Hot Dogs, Burgers, and Brats), Buns, Condiments
  • Charcoal


I am asking everyone to bring...

  • A $2/person donation towards the cost of food, other amenities, and shelter reservation
  • A side dish (salads, pastas, fruit, veggie, desserts, etc.), and note this in the discussion thread
  • Bring a chair just in case if there's not enough seating
  • Bring a kite, footballs, frisbees, gloves and baseballs, bocci, etc.
  • Pop-Up EZ tents if you have one
  • Slip and Slide (aka Crocodile Mile)


Some Final Details:

  • Certain beverages are not allowed at the park. You are on your own with your decisions and responsibilities. With that being said, if you plan on bringing said beverages, please conceal them in a cup. No glass.
  • You are more than welcome to bring friends outside the meetup group, just please note if you are bringing guests when you RSVP
  • Try to RSVP a week before the event so I can buy up enough food and supplies for all
  • This is going to be a rain or shine event


Additional details will likely come and I'll post them here as they come to mind, or individuals bring them up to my attention.
item.how_to_find_us: The picnic will be located at Shelter #3 (see map in the details)
item.name: The Great Providence Collective Picnic (aka PCP)
